metacity_theme.draw_ops: <title version="< 3.1" x="(0 `max` ((width - title_width) / 2)) + 2" y="(0 `max` ((height - title_height) / 2)) + 2" color="C_title_focused_hilight" /> <title version="< 3.1" x="(0 `max` ((width - title_width) / 2)) + 2" y="(0 `max` ((height - title_height) / 2)) + 1" color="C_title_focused" />
<title version="< 3.1" x="(0 `max` ((width - title_width) / 2)) + 2" y="(0 `max` ((height - title_height) / 2)) + 1" color="C_title_unfocused"/>
